com.lehman.ic9

Class environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lehman.ic9.environment

  • public class environment
extends java.lang.Object
    Environment object holds some of the ic9engine environment information such as included files and such.
    Author:
    Austin Lehman

    • Method Detail

      • include

        public void include(java.lang.String FileName)
             throws ic9exception,
                    java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                    javax.script.ScriptException
        Includes the new JS file with the provided file name. The include method checks the following locations for the included file name.

        current_path/
        current_path/.ipm (packages)
        assembly_path/stdjslib
        assembly_path/jslib
        Parameters:
        FileName - is a String with the file name to include.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - File not found.
        javax.script.ScriptException - Exception
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Exception

      • foundInLocalIpm

        public boolean foundInLocalIpm(java.lang.String localIpmPath,
                               java.lang.String IncludeFile)
                        throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                               javax.script.ScriptException,
                               ic9exception
        Checks the local .ipm directory, parses the installed.json file and loops through the installed packages looking for the include file. If found it loads it, adds it to the includes list and then returns true. Otherwise it returns false.
        Parameters:
        localIpmPath - Is a String with the local .ipm directory path.
        IncludeFile - Is a String with the file that needs to be included.
        Returns:
        A boolean with true if the file was found and included and false if not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Exception
        javax.script.ScriptException - Exception
        ic9exception - Exception

      • includeJar

        public void includeJar(java.lang.String JarFileName)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Dynamically loads a Java JAR file with the supplied JAR file name.
        Parameters:
        JarFileName - is a String with the JAR file name to load.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception

      • includeJarsInPath

        public void includeJarsInPath(java.lang.String JarPath,
                              boolean Recursive)
                       throws ic9exception
        Loads all Java JAR files within the provided path. If recursive is true then it will load all JAR files within sub directories as well.
        Parameters:
        JarPath - is a String with the path to search for JAR files.
        Recursive - is a boolean with true for recursive and false for not.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - Exception

      • getEngine

        public ic9engine getEngine()
        Gets the reference to the ic9engine object.
        Returns:
        An ice9engine object.
